Title: Leaf from Qur'an
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.554 is a later addition to the manuscript. Added in the 5th century AH/AD 11th century, it is executed in a hand influenced by or imitating the future of the New Abbasid Style (Broken Cursive).
Keywords: Abbasid; Arabic; Binding; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Islamic; Koran; Manuscript; Qur`an; Central Arab Lands (Near East); Kufic; Early Abbasid script
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
